description_blocks.desc: A rich text description of the List.

copy_from_list_id.desc: ID of the List to copy.

include_copied_list_records.desc: Boolean indicating whether to include records when a List is copied.

todo_mode.desc: Boolean indicating whether the List should be used to track todo tasks.

errors.permission_denied: The user does not have permission to perform this action.
errors.invalid_primary_column: Missing or more than one primary column.
errors.over_list_file_maximum: Cannot create any more List files.
errors.over_title_length_maximum: Title can not exceed defined length.
errors.over_column_maximum: Cannot create List with more than allowed column count.
